data.lyric:
[ti:Easy On Me]
[ar:Adele]
[al:Easy On Me]
[by:joublehe]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Easy On Me - Adele
[00:01.98]Lyrics by：Adele Adkins/Greg Kurstin
[00:04.87]Composed by：Adele Adkins/Greg Kurstin
[00:08.11]
[00:13.00]There ain't no gold
[00:15.79]
[00:16.43]In this river
[00:18.63]
[00:19.64]That I've been washing my hands in forever
[00:25.60]
[00:26.54]I know there is hope
[00:29.35]
[00:29.85]In these waters
[00:32.21]
[00:33.19]But I can't bring myself to swim
[00:37.05]When I am drowning
[00:39.96]In this silence baby let me in
[00:46.72]Go easy on me baby
[00:52.58]
[00:53.76]I was still a child
[00:55.95]
[00:57.15]Didn't get the chance to
[01:00.22]
[01:00.94]Feel the world around me
[01:06.12]
[01:06.85]I had no time to choose
[01:09.48]
[01:10.25]What I chose to do
[01:13.17]
[01:13.88]So go easy on me
[01:18.68]
[01:27.41]There ain't no room
[01:30.08]
[01:30.69]For things to change
[01:32.85]
[01:33.97]When we are both so deeply
[01:37.43]Stuck in our ways
[01:39.91]
[01:40.90]You can't deny how hard I have tried
[01:47.14]
[01:47.88]I changed who I was
[01:50.41]To put you both first
[01:52.95]But now I give up
[01:57.65]Go easy on me baby
[02:03.64]
[02:04.69]I was still a child
[02:06.95]
[02:07.85]Didn't get the chance to 
[02:11.12]
[02:12.07]Feel the world around me
[02:17.98]Had no time to choose
[02:20.52]
[02:21.23]What I chose to do
[02:23.88]
[02:24.90]So go easy on me
[02:37.43]
[02:39.09]I had good intentions
[02:42.93]
[02:43.54]And the highest hopes
[02:47.10]But I know right now
[02:49.40]
[02:49.97]It probably doesn't even show
[02:54.15]
[02:55.25]Go easy on me baby
[03:01.40]
[03:02.02]I was still a child
[03:04.42]
[03:05.11]I didn't get the chance to 
[03:09.57]Feel the world around me
[03:14.23]
[03:15.24]I had no time to choose
[03:17.89]
[03:18.77]What I chose to do
[03:21.17]
[03:22.29]So go easy on me
